events.name: ArtScience on Screen: High Adventure
events.description:
ArtScience on Screen: HIGH ADVENTURE 

A programme of family-friendly films that celebrate our thirst for adventure and our desire to explore the great unknown. Follow some of the least likely heroes: a dare-devil archaeologist and a haphazard museum night-guard, as well as our most important natural history icons, Sir David Attenborough and Charles Darwin.

Creation
1 â€“ 7, 10 Jan
11am, 12.45pm, 2.30pm, 4.15pm
Classification: PG
Running time: 104 mins
Director: Jon Amiel

Discover the story behind one of the most brilliant naturalist, Charles  Darwin and his religious wife and the struggles in their relationship when he writes - 'On the Origin of Species', which changes the way people think about mankind's evolution.

#TreasuresASM #ArtScienceOnScreen
